product_vision: TaskMaster Pro is a comprehensive project management platform designed for  remote teams to streamline collaboration, track progress, and deliver projects  on time. The platform combines task management, team communication, and  analytics to boost productivity and team satisfaction.

epics.title: Core Task Management System
epics.description: Develop a robust task creation, assignment, and tracking system that allows remote teams to organize and manage their work efficiently. This includes features like task prioritization, deadlines, and status updates to ensure clarity and accountability.
epics.business_value: Increases team productivity by 20% through structured task workflows and reduces missed deadlines by 30%.
success_criteria: 90% of tasks are completed within set deadlines
User adoption rate of task features reaches 80% within 3 months
risks: Potential user resistance to adopting new workflows

epics.title: Real-Time Team Communication Hub
epics.description: Build an integrated communication platform within TaskMaster Pro to enable seamless messaging, file sharing, and notifications for remote teams. This reduces reliance on external tools and keeps project discussions centralized.
epics.business_value: Reduces communication overhead by 25% and improves team response time by 15%.
dependencies: Core Task Management System for linking communications to tasks
success_criteria: 80% of users actively use communication features weekly
Average message response time under 10 minutes
risks: User preference for existing tools like Slack

epics.title: Project Progress Analytics Dashboard
epics.description: Create a comprehensive analytics dashboard to provide insights into project progress, team performance, and bottlenecks. This empowers administrators and team leads to make data-driven decisions for improved outcomes.
epics.business_value: Improves project delivery time by 15% through actionable insights and increases stakeholder satisfaction by providing transparency.
dependencies: Core Task Management System for data collection
success_criteria: Dashboard usage by 70% of team leads monthly
10% reduction in project delays after implementation

epics.title: Customizable User Roles and Permissions
epics.description: Implement a flexible role-based access control system to allow administrators to define user permissions and ensure data security. This enables tailored access for different team members based on their responsibilities.
epics.business_value: Reduces security incidents by 30% and improves administrative efficiency by 20% through streamlined access management.
dependencies: Core Task Management System for role integration
success_criteria: 100% of user roles configured within first week of onboarding
risks: Potential misconfiguration leading to access issues

epics.title: Mobile Accessibility for Remote Teams
epics.description: Develop a responsive mobile application to ensure remote team members can access TaskMaster Pro on the go. This includes core task management and communication features for seamless productivity across devices.
epics.business_value: Increases user engagement by 25% by enabling access anytime, anywhere, and supports remote work flexibility.
success_criteria: Mobile app adoption by 60% of users within 2 months
Feature parity with web app for 90% of core functionalities
risks: Performance issues on varied mobile devices
Higher development cost for cross-platform support

epics.title: Integration with Third-Party Tools
epics.description: Enable integrations with popular tools like Google Workspace, Slack, and Zoom to enhance interoperability for remote teams. This ensures TaskMaster Pro fits into existing workflows and reduces friction in adoption.
epics.business_value: Boosts platform adoption by 30% by supporting existing tool ecosystems and saves users 10% of time spent switching tools.
success_criteria: At least 3 major integrations live within 6 months
50% of users connect at least one third-party tool
risks: API limitations or changes from third-party providers
